description: Car troubles can be a bitch, and that’s what coworkers Scott Hunter and Goran learn on a rainy drive home from the office. Scott offers Goran a lift, but when his car breaks down outside of Scott’s apartment, Goran spends the night with him. The two hot guys have had office crushes on one another, and the situation is too perfect not to mess around. Scott might be a powerful player in the boardroom, but he’s a submissive bottom in the bedroom, as he proves when he drops to his knees and feasts on Goran’s cock. Goran can’t believe how incredible the blowjob is that Scott gives him, so he has to prove his own ability by bending him over and ramming with his stiff dick! The veins in Scott’s head are bulging from the pounding Goran delivers -- it’s such an intense fuck the neighbors surely heard what these two businessmen were up to after hours when the new workday began!
title: Scott Hunter and Goran Have a Nighttime Affair
